ERCC Dashboard
* Dashboard Plots

```{R}
#run the ERCC Dashboard on the appropriate count tables
  appid=p$app(name="runDashboard")$id
    tsk <- p$task_add(name = paste("Dashboard_Analysis",sampleid,sep="_"), 
           description = paste("ERCC_Dashboard_Analysis of",sampleid,sep="_"), 
           app = appid,
           inputs = list(
              filenameRoot=NIST_HiSeq_Mixes,
              isNorm= FALSE,
              sample1Name: MixM,
              sample2Name: MixL,
              erccdilution: 1,
              spikeVol: 50,
              totalRNAmass: 2500,
              choseFDR= 0.05,
              source_file=p$file(name=mastercounttbl),
              erccmix="RatioPair"
           )
)
    tsk$run()
```
